testsuite.name: webTestCases.Module1_Registration

testcase.name: tc001_VerifyRegistrationWithValidData
testcase.system-out: MapData : {DomainName=testdemouser, FirstName=Karthick, TCNO=tc001, LastName=TestUser, Password=Ka@12345} Chrome browser launched Browser maximized Navigated to https://demowebshop.tricentis.com/ Implicit wait set to 5 seconds Register Link is displayed Clicked on Register Link Register Text is displayed Clicked on Male Radio button Entered Karthick into FirstName TextField Entered TestUser into LastName TextField Random Number generated : 77886 Entered testdemouser77886@gmail.com into Email TextField Entered Ka@12345 into Password TextField Entered Ka@12345 into Confirm Password TextField Clicked on Register button Registration Completed Msg is displayed

testcase.name: tc003_VerifyRegistrationWithAlreadyRegisteredData
testcase.system-out: MapData : {RegisteredEmail=mkar@gmail.com, FirstName=Karthick, TCNO=tc003, LastName=TestUser, Password=Ka@12345} Chrome browser launched Browser maximized Navigated to https://demowebshop.tricentis.com/ Implicit wait set to 5 seconds Register Link is displayed Clicked on Register Link Register Text is displayed Clicked on Male Radio button Entered Karthick into FirstName TextField Entered TestUser into LastName TextField Entered mkar@gmail.com into Email TextField Entered Ka@12345 into Password TextField Entered Ka@12345 into Confirm Password TextField Clicked on Register button Already exists error Msg is displayed
